name: Gayathiri K G
careerObjective: Enthusiastic and detail-oriented Entry-Level Full-Stack Web Developer with hands-on experience in building responsive websites and dashboards using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Excel. Eager to contribute to real-world projects and continue learning through impactful internships in a collaborative environment.
certifications: Kaashiv Infotech, Chennai – Full-Stack Development Training

projects.name: E-Commerce Website
projects.description: Built a responsive, user-friendly e-commerce site using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented product display, shopping cart functionality, and basic interactivity.

projects.name: Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Designed a dynamic dashboard in Excel to analyze and visualize sales KPIs. Used pivot tables, charts, and functions to support strategic decision-making.

education: Bachelor of Commerce (Computer Science) – Sourashtra College, Madurai (2018 - 2021)
Higher Secondary Certificate – Sita Lakshmi Girls Higher Secondary School, Madurai (2016 - 2018)
achievements: Successfully completed full-stack development projects during training.
Active contributor to team projects and collaborative problem-solving sessions.
Participated in workshops and seminars on web development.
additionalInfo: Availability for relocation and remote work.
Committed to continuous professional development through online courses and coding challenges.
